name: File Fisher
short_description:
This is an easy to use , simple and straightforward software , which makes your life much easier . If you want to copy all the pictures ( Which are mixed with other files like music or documents ) from a pendrive / hard disk to another location ,
Just drag and drop / browse the source and destination folders  and specify which file types you need to copy / move , hit start , sit back and relax . 
You can see the progress in the main window itself.

 Check 'Preserve File Structure' to copy the sub folders along with the files and maintain the same file structure . 
Check 'Copy All' to copy all the files in the given folder .

File Fisher remembers all the extensions you have entered previously and displays a filtered list as you type it next time .
summary: Copy/Move files of required extension easily
